Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CCGDCPES WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY CCGDCPESCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_CCGDCPES ( CCGDCPESCODI, PROYCODI, ANIO, MES, DEMANDAENERGIA, DEMANDAHP, DEMANDAHFP, GENERACIONENERGIA, GENERACIONHP, GENERACIONHFP, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :CCGDCPESCODI, :PROYCODI, :ANIO, :MES, :DEMANDAENERGIA, :DEMANDAHP, :DEMANDAHFP, :GENERACIONENERGIA, :GENERACIONHP, :GENERACIONHFP, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_CCGDCPES SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, ANIO = :ANIO, DEMANDAENERGIA = :DEMANDAENERGIA, DEMANDAHP = :DEMANDAHP, DEMANDAHFP = :DEMANDAHFP, GENERACIONENERGIA = :GENERACIONENERGIA, GENERACIONHP = :GENERACIONHP, GENERACIONHFP = :GENERACIONHFP, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE CCGDCPESCODI = :CCGDCPESCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_CCGDCPES ORDER BY CCGDCPESCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_CCGDCPES SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = 0
SELECT * FROM CAM_CCGDCPES WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
